alert.note: Alert for Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Benzie; Leelanau; Manistee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:55AM EST until January 27 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Leelanau, Benzie and Manistee Counties, and Beaver Island and surrounding islands. * WHEN...From noon today to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Rapid visibility reductions will be possible with snowfall rates between 0.5 inch and 1 inch per hour and strong wind gusts. Plan on slippery road conditions with accumulating snowfall. Blowing snow across open areas could further reduce visibility at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Benzie; Leelanau; Manistee
